page.title: 12MARK'S HOUSE
page.content: I live in a {semi detached house}with a front and back garden. There is a {shed and garage.}The{garden}is fairly big,with flowers like roses,daffodils and geraniums.There is also a{pond with{koi carp}in.I have a{kitchen}with built in units and tiles on the the floor.There is a{living room}with wooden table and chairs.There's also wood chip wall paper and a carpet on the floor.There is a tv and video and a three piece suite.The{hall}has stairs going upwards and a telephone in the corner with the front door next to it.The house has{central heating. There are{three bedrooms}and one {bathroom.}The bedrooms have wall paper and carpets with dressing tables,bed, wardrobes and curtains.The{bathroom has a bath,toilet,wash basin and a cabinet for toothbrushes and razors. {
